wizard.name: Sencha/PhoneGap based configurable project
wizard.description: Creates a Mobile project based on Sencha/PhoneGap frameworks, which features are configurable thanks to the following wizard.

wizard.name: jQuery Mobile based empty project
wizard.description: Creates a Mobile project based on jQueryMobile framework, which features are configurable (simply uncomment them inside code).

wizard.name: 3270 Web Style
wizard.description: Creates an IBM 3270 Web style webization project.

wizard.name: 5250 Web Style
wizard.description: Creates an IBM 5250 Web style webization project.

wizard.name: DKU7xxx Web Style
wizard.description: Creates a BULL DKUxxx Web style webization project.

wizard.name: 3270 Flex Style
wizard.description: Creates an IBM 3270 Flex webization project.

wizard.name: 5250 Flex Style
wizard.description: Creates an IBM 5250 Flex webization project.

wizard.name: 3270 Screen
wizard.description: Creates an IBM 3270 Screen based WebService connector project.

wizard.description: Creates an IBM 5250 Screen based WebService connector project.

wizard.description: Creates a BULL DKU7xx Screen based WebService connector project.

wizard.description: Creates a Minitel Screen based WebService connector project.

wizard.name: Unix VTxxx Screen
wizard.description: Creates an UNIX VTxxx Screen based WebService connector project.

wizard.name: CICS COMMAREA
wizard.description: Creates an IBM CICS COMMAREA based WebService connector project.

wizard.name: HTML Web Site
wizard.description: Creates an HTML Web Site based WebService connector project.

wizard.name: Web Clipping
wizard.description: Creates an HTML Web Clipping connector project.

wizard.name: Sequencer project
wizard.description: Creates a sequencer project.

wizard.name: SQL project
wizard.description: Creates a SQL project.

wizard.name: Site Clipper project
wizard.description: Creates a Site Clipper connector project.

wizard.name: Legacy integration
wizard.description: Imports the legacy integration sample project to use with Convertigo Legacy Integrator Quick Guide documentation.

wizard.name: Legacy publishing
wizard.description: Imports the legacy publishing sample project to use with Convertigo Legacy Publisher Quick Guide documentation.

wizard.name: Mashup composition
wizard.description: Imports the interaction hub sample project to use with Convertigo Mashup Composer Quick Guide documentation.

wizard.name: Mashup sequencing
wizard.description: Imports the mashup sequencer sample project to use with Convertigo Mashup Sequencer Quick Guide documentation.

wizard.name: Web clipping
wizard.description: Imports the web clipping sample project to use with Convertigo Web Clipper Quick Guide documentation.

wizard.name: Web integration
wizard.description: Imports the web integration sample project to use with Convertigo Web Integrator Quick Guide documentation.

wizard.name: Mobile Sencha-based
wizard.description: Imports the Mobilizer sample project to use with "My first Convertigo Mobilizer project" tutorial.

wizard.name: Site clipping
wizard.description: Imports the Site clipper sample project to use with "My first Convertigo Site Clipper project" tutorial.

wizard.name: Site Clipper objects examples
wizard.description: Imports the sample project containing Site Clipper objects examples described in the Reference Manual.

wizard.name: HTML connector statements examples
wizard.description: Imports the sample project containing HTML connector statements examples described in the Reference Manual.

wizard.name: Sequencer steps examples
wizard.description: Imports the sample project containing Sequencer steps examples described in the Reference Manual.

wizard.name: Variables examples
wizard.description: Imports the sample project containing variables examples described in the Reference Manual.

wizard.name: HTTP connector objects examples
wizard.description: Imports the sample project containing HTTP connector objects examples described in the Reference Manual.

wizard.name: Web Clipper objects examples
wizard.description: Imports the sample project containing Web Clipper objects examples described in the Reference Manual.

wizard.name: jQuery Mobile based full-featured sample project
wizard.description: Imports a full-featured Mobile sample project based on jQueryMobile framework.

wizard.name: Sencha based Pdf sample
wizard.description: Imports a Sencha based sample project which downloads a PDF file from Convertigo web site.

wizard.name: Sencha based WebToPdf sample
wizard.description: Imports a Sencha based sample project which downloads any HTML page as a PDF file.

wizard.name: Sencha based NYTimes sample
wizard.description: Imports a Sencha based sample project which reads New York Times RSS feeds.

wizard.name: Sencha based Siebel sample
wizard.description: Imports a Sencha based sample project which connects to a Siebel application.

wizard.name: Sencha based US Directory sample
wizard.description: Imports a Sencha based sample project which makes search on the US Directory web site.

wizard.name: HSQLDB database sample project
wizard.description: Imports an HSQLDB database sample project.

wizard.name: Excel file database sample project
wizard.description: Imports an Excel file database sample project.

wizard.name: REST Web service
wizard.description: Creates an HTTP based Web Service connector project to invoke a remote REST web service.

wizard.name: SOAP Web service
wizard.description: Creates an HTTP based Web Service connector project to invoke a remote SOAP web service, by importing its WSDL description file.

wizard.name: Google Maps
wizard.description: Imports the convertigo Google Maps library project.

wizard.name: Google Spreadsheets
wizard.description: Imports the convertigo Google Spreadsheets library project.

wizard.description: Imports the convertigo SalesForce demo project.

wizard.description: Imports the convertigo US Directory demo project.

wizard.name: Legacy CRM
wizard.description: Imports the convertigo Legacy CRM demo project.

wizard.description: Imports the convertigo mashup demo project.

wizard.description: Creates an interaction hub project.

wizard.name: Convertigo project

wizard.name: Convertigo project
wizard.description: Export a convertigo project from the workspace.
